banner.secondTitle: Discover the Sine Saloum on an electric bike

first.title: an unforgettable experience
first.description: Come and explore the roads, tracks and beaches of Sine Saloum, one of Senegal's most beautiful regions, on our electric bikes.

second.title: opt for eco-mobility
second.description: In an environmentally-friendly approach, Thiop Thiop Bike has chosen to promote soft mobility for an authentic experience.

third.title: enjoy traditional dishes
third.description: During our lunches, you will enjoy local cuisine and homemade juices. Thieboudienne, fataya, yassa and caldou will hold no secrets for you.

excursions.title: Our excursions
excursions.description: For a few hours, half a day or a full day, we offer a range of private tours. For more information, don't hesitate to contact us by e-mail or book directly.

steps.crossingTheSambiaForest: Crossing the Sambia Dia classified forest

steps.relaxationInBolongs: Relaxation and swimming in the bolongs
steps.guidedFadiouthShellfishIsland: Guided tour of Fadiouth shellfish island
steps.discoveryBaobabFadial: Discovery of the sacred baobab of Fadial
steps.aperitifEntertainement: Aperitif, djembé entertainment and traditional songs
steps.sacredWellOfCheikh: Sacred well of Cheikh Oumar Fouty Tall

cgu.title: general terms of use of the website
cgu.description: Trademarks, logos, signs and all site content (text, images, sound, etc.) are protected by the French Intellectual Property Code, and more specifically by copyright. The user must request prior authorization from the site for any reproduction, publication or copy of the various contents. The user undertakes to use the contents of the site in a strictly private context; any use for commercial or advertising purposes is strictly forbidden. Any total or partial representation of this site by any process whatsoever, without the express authorization of the website operator, would constitute an infringement. Users who reproduce, copy or publish protected content must cite the author and source.

cgv.title: terms and conditions of sale
cgv.underFirstDescription: A deposit of 25% of the total cost of the chosen excursion is required to confirm the booking. The remaining 75% must be paid the day before the tour. Payments are to be made by Wave, Sendwave or Orange Money. Our account details will be sent to you at the time of booking. Transfer costs are at your own expense.
cgv.underSecondDescription: In the event of cancellation, the 25% deposit is retained by THIOP THIOP BIKE.

prices.title: Take advantage of our offers
prices.reservationProcessing: *Reservation requests processed within a maximum of 48 hours
prices.description: If you have any specific requests, please don't hesitate to contact us by e-mail or WhatsApp.

first.title: Day trip
first.description:

teams.title: The team
teams.description: Experience a moment of escape in the company of our team of experienced guides and talented cooks.
